backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus adminâ€‘created income entries and public queries for entry listing and total income.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm neutral OKLCH theme with light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining the root layout and routes for dashboard and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header navigation, page container, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/EntriesTable.tsx: Table component that formats and displays income entries with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching entries, checking admin status, and creating income entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders an admin interface that requires authentication and admin status, allowing creation of new income entries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays income statistics and a table of entries using data loaded from the backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a spending/income tracking app with admin Internet Identity login, public dashboard, existing features, and pending feature requests. Contains metadata, architecture notes, and requirements for admin auth, entry creation, and income calculations.
